DOC.brief_summary: Acute , randomize , placebo control , double blind , 4 arm crossover study determine effect different combination plant base extract cognitive function cerebral blood flow .
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study assess effect oral consumption three differ combination plant base extract , cognitive function cerebral blood flow ( use Near infrared Spectroscopy ) comparison placebo . The primary outcome change cognitive function mental fatigue extend performance Cognitive Demand Battery ( CDB ) 1 , 3 6 hour post- consumption .
DOC.criteria: Are 18 49 year age Selfreport good health Are exclude basis follow exclusion criterion English first language ( cognitive test validate native English speaker ) Are 18 49 year age Are smoker Have food allergy sensitivities ingredient contain investigational product foodstuff Currently take medication except contraceptive pill Have habitually use dietary supplement within last month ( define 3 consecutive day 4 day total ) Have sleep disturbance and/or take sleep aid medication Have Body Mass Index ( BMI ) outside range 1835 kg/m2 Have high blood pressure ( systolic 139 mm Hg diastolic 89 mm Hg ) Have history neurological , vascular psychiatric illness include epilepsy seizure ( exclude depressive illness anxiety ) Have current diagnosis anxiety depression Are pregnant , try get pregnant breast feeding Have recent history ( within 12 month screen visit ) strong potential alcohol substance abuse . Alcohol abuse define 60g ( men ) / 40g ( woman ) pure alcohol per day ( 7 / 5.5 unit ) Are ( seek become ) pregnant lactate Have learn difficulty , dyslexia colour blindness Have visual impairment correct glass contact lens Have frequent migraine require medication ( equal 1 per month ) Have disorder blood Have heart disorder history vascular illness Have respiratory disorder require regular medication ( Note : participant asthma take medication occasionally/as require eligible study ) Have type I type II diabetes Have history renal hepatic disease , severe diseases gastrointestinal tract ( e.g . iron accumulation , iron utilization disorder , hypercalcaemia , hypercalciuria ) , likely interfere metabolism/absorption/secretion product investigation Have health condition would prevent fulfillment study requirement Are currently past 4 week participate clinical nutrition intervention study Do bank account ( required payment )
